tool.name: Burst Projection

param.name: channels
param.label: Optional: Enter comma-separated list of channels to process.
param.help: Leave blank to process all available channels. Channels with no burst images will be copied to the output folder (so all images are together for downstream processing).

param.name: input_image_path
param.label: Optional: Enter path to images that need to be montaged.
param.help: Leave blank to get from BackgroundCorrected folder in the Galaxy output folder, or enter path to images to be montaged, e.g. /finkbeiner/imaging/smb-robodata/your_folders/BackgroundCorrected

param.name: output_results_path
param.label: Optional: Enter path to output destination.
param.help: Leave blank to save to BurstProjected folder in the Galaxy output folder, or enter another path, e.g. /finkbeiner/imaging/smb-robodata/your_folders/BurstProjected

tool.help: Project burst images into a single image.
